comment: This is generated by ESQL's AbstractFunctionTestCase. Do no edit it. See ../README.md for how to regenerate it.
name: substring
description: Returns a substring of a string, specified by a start position and an optional length.

params.name: string
params.description: String expression. If `null`, the function returns `null`.

params.name: length
params.description: Length of the substring from the start position. Optional; if omitted, all positions after `start` are returned.

params.name: string
params.description: String expression. If `null`, the function returns `null`.

params.name: length
params.description: Length of the substring from the start position. Optional; if omitted, all positions after `start` are returned.

examples:
FROM employees
| KEEP last_name
| EVAL ln_sub = SUBSTRING(last_name, 1, 3)

FROM employees
| KEEP last_name
| EVAL ln_sub = SUBSTRING(last_name, -3, 3)

FROM employees
| KEEP last_name
| EVAL ln_sub = SUBSTRING(last_name, 2)
